snippet.title: Title: Concepts of Space, Time, and Consciousness in Ancient India
snippet.description:
Title: Concepts of Space, Time, and Consciousness in Ancient India
Authors: Subhash Kak
Comments: 14 pages; with minor corrections and a few additional references
Journal-ref: In S. Kak, "The Wishing Tree", 2001 (Munshiram Manoharlal, New Delhi, ISBN: 81-215-1032-5.)
Subjects: History and Philosophy of Physics (physics.hist-ph); Popular Physics (physics.pop-ph)
